title: Nikon Coolpix S2500
text:
Nikon Coolpix 2500 is a <a href="digital%20camera">digital camera</a> released by <a href="Nikon">Nikon</a> in February 2011. Its image sensor is a <a href="Charge-coupled%20device">CCD</a> with 12 million effective pixels and has 4 colors available: <a href="pink">pink</a>, <a href="red">red</a>, <a href="silver%20%28color%29">silver</a> and <a href="black">black</a>.
Scene Modes.
The S2500 has 6 scene modes which can be selected on the back of the camera:
